name: Slime Running
description:
Can you leave the mine?

Help our friend get out of the mine, which is being invaded by SLIMES! Use your mental agility to escape from these strange creatures and thus overcome each level.

And you, at what level can you reach?

                                                                                                                                           

The video game focuses on being able to escape from each room, which will be constantly filled with slimes that will overwhelm you. For that you must escape.

Live a unique adventure: Each level is random and your difficulty will increase.
